mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from XT_SSJJY where ssid = #{ssid} and zt='1' and ( zb = '' or zb is null )
SELECT jj.* from XT_SSJJY ssjj, XT_JJRY jj where ssjj.ryid = jj.id and ssjj.ssid = #{ssid} and ssjj.zt = '1' and ( zb = '' or zb is null ) order by jj.xm asc limit ${startPage}, ${page}

SELECT jjy.* ,ry.xm, ry.dh, group_concat(dm.dmmc) as sbmc, group_concat(jl.id separator '|') as jlid FROM XT_SSJJY jjy left join XT_SSJJYSB jjysb on jjysb.ssjjyid = jjy.id and jjysb.zt = '1' left join XT_BSYSB sb on sb.id = jjysb.sbid and sbzt = '1' left join XT_GYDM dm on sb.sblx = dm.id and lbid = '2' left join XT_JJRY ry on ry.id = jjy.ryid and ry.zt = '1' left join XT_SSJL jl on jl.ryid = jjy.ryid and jjy.ssid = jl.ssid and jl.zt in ('0','1') left join XT_QJJL qj on qj.id = jl.qjid and jjy.ssid = qj.ssid and qj.zt in ('1') where jjy.zt = '1' and jjy.ssid = #{ssid} and jjy.zb != '' group by jjy.id

SELECT jjy.* ,ry.xm, ry.dh, gw.gwmc, sflx.dmmc as sflx, ry.lb, group_concat(dm.dmmc) as sbmc, qj.id as qjid, qj.zt as qjzt,qj.xm as qjxm, qj.dh as qjdh FROM XT_SSJJY jjy left join XT_SSGW gw on gw.id = jjy.gwid left join XT_SSJJYSB jjysb on jjysb.ssjjyid = jjy.id and jjysb.zt = '1' left join XT_BSYSB sb on sb.id = jjysb.sbid and sbzt = '1' left join XT_GYDM dm on sb.sblx = dm.id and dm.lbid = '2' left join XT_JJRY ry on ry.id = jjy.ryid and ry.zt = '1' left join XT_GYDM sflx on ry.sflx = sflx.id and sflx.lbid = '3' left join XT_SSJL jl on jl.ryid = jjy.ryid and jjy.ssid = jl.ssid and jl.zt in ('0','1') left join XT_QJJL qj on qj.id = jl.qjid and jjy.ssid = qj.ssid and qj.zt in ('1') where jjy.id = #{jjyid} group by jjy.id, qj.id
SELECT count(1) FROM XT_SSJJY jjy where jjy.zt = '1' and jjy.ssid = #{ssid}
select * from XT_JJRY ry where ry.zt = '1' and not exists (select 1 from XT_SSJJY jjy where jjy.ssid = #{ssid} and jjy.ryid = ry.id)
